name: Strange World (strangeworld)
description:
You are an intergalactic explorer seeking out a new home planet. You decide to check out a newly discovered planet that has been sending mysterious signals into space, both to see if it's inhabited and to find the source of the signal. Collect the blue key to get to the stone statue, or explore more to find a secret area...

Controls: 

  •  WASD or arrow keys to run
  • CTRL to crouch
  • SPACE to jump
  • You can also wall jump, by jumping into a wall and quickly jumping in the other direction.
